channel.title: Diy on Jack
channel.description: Recent content in Diy on Jack

item.title: The Adler Special Typewriter
item.description: A gift that the previous owners of my home left. I didn’t think much of it until I watched the documentary California Typewriter on a flight! Brought it outside, cleaned it out, and now I have a nice, heavy, writing machine. I’m very lucky to have found it in working condition. This is the most similar model that I’ve found online, though the key labels seem slightly different. As a fan of mechanical keyboards already, using this typewriter is a joy.

item.title: DIY camera finger strap
item.description: I just bought a used Fujifilm X70 in an attempt to save on space and weight. To keep chasing that goal, I made another change. Neck strap -> wrist strap -> finger strap. This is my take with the material I had lying around. I trimmed a simple velcro strap from some knock-off go-pro kit, and fitted it by trial and error: Comfortable, adjustable, and surprisingly secure.
